body.name: Lightweight Mini Tripod for Camera/Phone/Webcam, Extendable Stand, for Logitech Webcam C615 C920 C922 C922x C925e C930 C930e or Other Devices with 1/4" Thread(Black)

features: #Adjustable Height and Angle - This tripod stand is designed with three adjustable height levels. You can extend the height from 3-13 inches. The tripod head ball-joint allows for 360-degree rotation and up to a 90-degree tilt.

#Stable and Durable - Made of highly-durable ABS plastic and designed with non-slip rubber pads to ensure the tripod remains stable, this tripod offers maximum stability for your devices and helps you to take stunning photos from anywhere.

#Compact and Lightweight - Weighing in at just 0.24 lb. with a foldable height of 6.4 inches, this tripod is easy to carry when traveling, hiking, or camping, allowing you to take photos of the whole family and capture those precious moments.

#1/4" Extension Interface - The tripod uses a standard 1/4-inch mounting screw. This fits the majority of digital cameras, GoPros, Webcams, DSLR’s, Cell Phone and Camcorders. The smartphone clamp with a 1/4-inch mounting hole is included; you can mount a smartphone or other device for multiple shooting needs.

#Inside the Box - Package includes: 1 x Tripod, 1 x Phone Holder, 1 x Rotation Platform. While durable, the tripod is not intended for overly heavy camera setups; please use caution when utilizing larger devices or rigs.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.4 4.4 out of 5 stars 16 ratings 4.4 out of 5 stars

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Extendable and Foldable The compact tripod weighs only 0.24 pounds and boasts a foldable height of 6.4 inches. It is short enough to fit perfectly into your suitcase or backpack and easy to carry when traveling, hiking, or camping. With a fully extended height of 13 inches, this tripod allows you to take photos and capture the best moments with ease. Stable and Durable The anti-slip rubber feet of the tripod offer great stability for your devices. The non-slip rubber phone mounting surface prevents your phone from falling or shaking while in use. Unlock and release the tripod in seconds for easy height adjustment. Universal 1/4-inch Screw The tripod's 1/4-inch screw ensures secure mounting of the webcam or other device. The ball-joint head allows for 360-degree rotation and up to a 90-degree tilt. Just turn and tighten to change the orientation.

360-degree Surround Adjustable Panorama rotation: 360 ° 1/4" Screw Connector Universal 1/4" screw interface, fit for all device with 1/4" screw interface Mini Size Working height: 15.6 inch Closed height: 6.9 inch Durable Body Material: nylon plus fiber + Steel

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Compact Tripod, Easy to Use!
reviews.reviewText: I’ve had this tripod for a couple of weeks and I’ve now used it on more than a few occasions, including Thanksgiving. The tripod is very compact and lightweight. It folds up to a pretty small size and you can carry it with you. It only stands at a little over a foot tall when expanded. I found it best to put it on a raised surface (i.e., table, chair, countertop, etc.) in order to get a good straight-on picture.The tripod comes with a threaded end for a professional or semi-professional camera such as a Canon or Nikon would work well for this stand. Additionally, the tripod comes with a phone cradle (soft foam padding and plastic outside). This works well to hold most smartphones, by the way.The tripod has a swivel that can turn 365 degrees. This works decently for setting the camera up in a centralized location and then adjusting the swivel to line up the picture. I’ve used it using this method a couple of times and it really works well. I put my tripod in a small case I have and it goes with us when we’re on family outings. Overall I’d say this tripod is simple, but durable and easy to carry and use. I highly recommend this tripod.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cost-effective and versatile
reviews.reviewText: Maybe professionals will disagree with me but sometimes all you need is something that works. This works, period. It's adjustable and flexible in so many ways and can have uses from photography to video-chatting-to sellers on websites. This is for my wife, who photographs items for sale. She doesn't need high-end equipment, just equipment that does the job so she can maximize profit. The attachments etc., give her the choice of using a camera or using her phone. It's a little fidgety to make sure positioning etc. is right but that's all part of using a tripod - getting it positioned right.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I received this stand yesterday and I love it. It's also great for using on your phone whether it's taking photos. video calls, or browsing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Inespensive and it works
reviews.reviewText: For being inexpensive and working the way it's supposed to, I give this little tripod three stars. Not more stars because it's all plastic, it's in four pieces (and you have to break it down to make it small enough to carry easily), and there are no instructions at all. I've dealt with tripods for decades, so I readily figured it out, but I suspect many phone users will be baffled. It's OK if you think you'll want something only temporarily, such as on an upcoming vacation, but long-term there are much more convenient (and more costly) alternatives, some of which are also selfie sticks and many of which are better built.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not sure how long it will last
reviews.reviewText: So everything mentioned was included: * tripod * extension piece * mobile phone connectorThe pieces as they were shipped were partially assembled, but wrongly so I wasn't able to use it at first.I thought I had maybe received the wrong item.I ended up having to look at the picture, which is what made me realize that it had been pre-assembled wrongly and that's why it couldn't stand up on it's own.Once I fixed that, it mostly worked.The tripod extension is pretty flimsy, it doesn't want to stay in place unless you sort of turn it and latch it at the top. However this does not feel secure, could easily imagine this part ceasing to work someday soon. Also it seems very flimsy and a heavy enough object might prevent the extendable piece from staying extended. This I think makes it inappropriate for professional use (or if you're going to use it a lot and need the stand, probably i'd recommend something else)With the tripod extension it's about 1.5 feet. Without it the tripod is about a foot.To the manufacturer: please either pack each piece individually (rather than wrongly attaching pieces to save space) OR include a little piece of paper showing how to assemble it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Is a good selfie stick that doubles as stand holder for recording or whatever, is not that long wich is fine, but if you are looking for long stick this is not, works good for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Have Tripod will Travel... portable and lightweight
reviews.reviewText: When in a pinch it's nice to have a portable lightweight tripod on hand. This tripod is extremely lightweight and easy to use. It doesn't have bells and whistles, it has a function. The ball joint is as flashy as it gets. When folded up, this tripod can fit in to your back pocket.The spring loaded phone holder works great. You don't have to worry about knocking it out of the holder or the wind dislodging it. The grip on this holder is crazy tight. Use this tripod on a table , car hood, etc as its' 3 legs keep it stable and upright. This is a down an dirty functional item and everyone who shoots iphoneography should have one in their bag of accessories.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Perfect for a traveling Vlogger, super lightweight and easy to assemble and disassemble great for security checkpoints.
